text: Battle Beyond the Stars is a 1980 American science fiction western movie directed by Jimmy T. Murakami and screenplay by John Sayles. It stars George Peppard, Robert Vaughn, Richard Thomas, John Saxon, Sybil Danning and it was distributed by New World Pictures. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980 science fiction movies Category:1980s Western (genre) movies Category:1980 action movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American action movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies composed by James Horner Category:American independent movies Category:1980 independent movies
title: Battle Beyond the Stars
